data.title: BObbytalkscinema.com
data.meta_description: Om Shanti Om & its inspirations, Inspired Movies, Inspired Cinema, Bollywood Plagiarism, Plagiarism in Hindi Cinema, Copied Movies, Inspiration from World Cinema
data.text:
A warm welcome to all friends with a loving invitation to read my personal expressions on movies, music, poetry and life.

Music, Movies and Books are like EARS and EYES to me, and if you also feel the same, then you are sure going to find many interesting articles in the different sections of the site worth your precious time and attention. If possible, do share your valuable comments and suggestions too, as they would be my guide for all the future projects and write-ups continuing on the path of learning.

Have a great day and enjoy the world of movies, music and poetry with BTC.

Cheers!

The articles on bobbytalkscinema.com are the personal views/expressions of Bobby Sing on cinema, music, books, poetry and life, written with no intention of hurting anyone in particular.

Respecting the sincere effort being made, please DO NOT COPY or reproduce any article/content without the required permissions.

However, you are free to share the selected articleâ€™s URL giving the due credits to the site and the writer with

HIS BLESSINGS
